name: aws-cli-pod
command:
cat <<EOF | kubectl apply -f -
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
    name: awscli
spec:
    hostNetwork: true
    containers:
    - name: aws-cli
      image: amazon/aws-cli:latest
      command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
      volumeMounts:
      - name: mypvc
        mountPath: /data
    volumes:
    - name: mypvc
      persistentVolumeClaim:
        claimName: <REPLACE_WITH_PV>
EOF

name: trivy-pod
command:
cat <<EOF | kubectl apply -f -
apiVersion: v1
kind: Pod
metadata:
  name: trivy
spec:
  containers:
  - image: aquasec/trivy
    name: trivy-scanner
    command: ['sleep', 'infinity']
EOF
